de.edgesoft.refereemanager.controller.crud

Interface IEditDialogCRUDActionsController<T extends ModelClassExt>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICRUDActionsController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOverviewController, OverviewClubsController, OverviewLeagueGamesController, OverviewOtherEventsController, OverviewPeopleController, OverviewRefereesController, OverviewTournamentsController, OverviewTraineesController

    public interface IEditDialogCRUDActionsController<T extends ModelClassExt>
extends ICRUDActionsController

    Interface for CRUD actions that open a dialog.

      • initEditDialogFXMLFilename

        void initEditDialogFXMLFilename(java.lang.String theFXMLFilename,
                                java.lang.String theTitleNoun)

        Sets edit dialog’s fxml filename and noun, shown in title (“edit ”).

        Parameters:
        theFXMLFilename - fxml filename of the edit view
        theTitleNoun - title noun of the edit view (“edit ”)

      • showEditDialog

        boolean showEditDialog(T theData)

        Opens the data edit dialog.

        If the user clicks OK, the changes are saved into the provided event object and true is returned.

        Parameters:
        theData - the data to be edited
        Returns:
        true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise.
